title: AI Risk Management Standard
description: This standard defines the requirements for establishing, implementing, and maintaining a comprehensive AI risk management system throughout the AI system lifecycle in compliance with EU AI Act Article 9 and aligned with ISO/IEC 42001 and NIST AI RMF.

kpis.name: Risk Assessment Coverage
kpis.definition: % of AI systems with current risk assessment
kpis.measurementMethod: (# AI systems with risk assessment / # total AI systems) × 100

kpis.name: Risk Assessment Timeliness
kpis.definition: % of risk assessments completed by target date

kpis.name: High/Critical Risk Treatment
kpis.definition: % of high/critical risks with approved treatment plans
kpis.measurementMethod: (# high/critical risks with treatment / # high/critical risks) × 100

kpis.name: Residual Risk Acceptance
kpis.measurementMethod: (# acceptable residual risks / # total residual risks) × 100

kpis.name: Risk Review Completion
kpis.definition: % of scheduled reviews completed on time
kpis.measurementMethod: (# reviews completed on time / # scheduled reviews) × 100

kpis.name: Risk Monitoring Coverage
kpis.definition: % of AI systems with active risk monitoring
kpis.measurementMethod: (# AI systems with monitoring / # total AI systems) × 100

kpis.name: Risk Indicator Threshold Breaches
kpis.definition: Number of threshold breaches per month

kpis.name: Risk Reporting Timeliness
kpis.definition: % of risk reports generated per schedule

kpis.name: Risk Management Effectiveness
kpis.definition: Overall risk management system effectiveness score
